nodes.text: What's so Bad About the Dark Side? The Ethical Dilemma of Force-Users

What's so Bad About the Dark Side? The Ethical Dilemma of Force-Users was a roleplaying game supplement written by Lester Smith and published in Polyhedron 108 in June 1995. Like all supplements printed in Polyhedron prior to 2002, the article is considered ambiguously canon.
